amendment.description: Amendment sought to add a new section at the end of the bill providing that research and development under the Act shall address issues with respect to increased volatile emissions or increased nitrogen oxide emissions.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to add a new section at the end of the bill providing that research and development under the Act shall address issues with respect to increased volatile emissions or increased nitrogen oxide emissions.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Burgess amendment (A012) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A012) offered by Mr. Burgess.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Burgess amendment (A012) Agreed to by voice vote.
